alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued April 17 at 3:37PM EDT until April 18 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 7 PM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to 2 ft of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along the Pamlico Sound, Trent, Bay and lower Neuse Rivers, and adjacent tidal creeks, areas along the Pamlico and Pungo Rivers and adjacent tidal creeks, and areas along the Pamlico Sound, Pungo and lower Pamlico Rivers. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 7 PM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Pamlico; Southern Craven
